select a.AskQuestionNum ,a.id ,a.askQuestionReplies ,a.AskQuestionTitle ,a.AskQuestionContent ,a.AskQuestionDate ,m.name from AskQuestion a, MemberBasic m where a.id = #{id} and a.id = m.id
and a.AskQuestionTitle like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or a.AskQuestionContent like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
and ${searchSelect} like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by AskQuestionNum desc

select AskQuestionNum ,id ,askQuestionReplies ,AskQuestionTitle ,AskQuestionContent ,AskQuestionDate from AskQuestion
where AskQuestionTitle like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or AskQuestionContent like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
where ${searchSelect} like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by AskQuestionNum desc

select count(*) from AskQuestion
where AskQuestionTitle like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or AskQuestionContent like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
where ${searchSelect} like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
select AskQuestionNum ,id ,AskQuestionTitle ,AskQuestionContent from AskQuestion where AskQuestionNum = #{AskQuestionNum}
select a.AskQuestionReplyNum ,a.AskQuestionNum ,a.id ,a.text ,a.inputdate ,m.name from AskQuestionReply a, MemberBasic m where a.AskQuestionNum = #{AskQuestionNum} and a.id = m.id
update AskQuestion set askQuestionReplies = askQuestionReplies+1 where askQuestionNum = #{askQuestionNum}
update AskQuestion set askQuestionReplies = askQuestionReplies-1 where askQuestionNum = #{askQuestionNum}
